page.title: 04Events
page.content: Each year in May the Dutch,bomb the R.A.F. home in Storrington with cheeses.They call themselves 'the Edam Busters'and this is their way of saying "thank-you"for the food parcels dropped in Holland when it was occupied by the Germans in the Second World War. In early June a mammoth "Caledonion Market" is held in the Recreation Ground by Storrington Lion Club.All proceeds from this sale of second hand furniture go towards helping the community and especially old people in the area. On various Saturdays throughout the summer,annual fetes ,barbecues and barn dances are held by local groups. A torchlight procession and firework display organized by the Round Table,has become an annual event at Guy Fawkes time.
